The air-conditioned villa consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a kettle, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and free toiletries. The accommodation also offers a flat-screen TV and 2 bathrooms with a hairdryer.

The nearest airport is Sultan Abdul Halim Airport, 16 km from the villa. From 1st January 2023, a tourist tax of RM 10 per room per night is applied to all foreign guests. This tax is not included in the room rate and must be paid upon check-in. Guests with a valid Malaysian Identity Card or valid permanent residents MY PR Card are exempted.
Managed by a private host
